title: Nullpointer exception in injection by annotation
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm getting NullpointerException injecting by annotation in the following hierarchy: `FruitResource -> FruitService -> FruitRepository`, as you can see below:

```java
@Singleton
public class FruitRepository {

    public Uni<Fruit> findByName(String name){
        return Uni.createFrom("Apple");
    }

}

@Singleton
public class FruitService {

    @Inject
    FruitRepository fruitRepository;

    public Uni<Fruit> findByName(String name){
        return this.findByName(name);
    }

}

@Singleton
@RouteBase(path = "/v1", produces = "application/json")
public class FruitResource {
    
    @Inject
    FruitService fruitService;

    @Route(path = "/fruit/:name", methods = HttpMethod.GET)
    public Uni<Fruit> fruitByName(@Param @NotNull String name) {
        log.info("FruitResource.fruits()");
        return this.fruitService.findByName(name);
    }

}
```

Just changing the injection by constructor (see the example below), it works fine. Also, changing the hierarchy by `FruitResource -> FruitRepository` instead.

```java
private FruitService fruitService;

public FruitResource(FruitService fruitService) {
    this.fruitService = fruitService;
}
```

Looking into the documentation I didn't find anything related with this.
